mapper.select: SELECT Q.SURVEY_QUESTION, O.SURVEY_OPT, Q.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID FROM survey_type_for_question AS T INNER JOIN survey_question AS Q ON T.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID = Q.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID LEFT JOIN survey_opt AS O ON Q.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID = O.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID WHERE T.SURVEY_TYPE_ID = 'F-01' ORDER BY O.OPT_ORDER;

SELECT Q.SURVEY_QUESTION, O.SURVEY_OPT, Q.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID FROM survey_type_for_question AS T INNER JOIN survey_question AS Q ON T.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID = Q.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID LEFT JOIN survey_opt AS O ON Q.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID = O.SURVEY_QUESTION_ID WHERE T.SURVEY_TYPE_ID = 'F-02' ORDER BY Q.QUESTION_ORDER, O.OPT_ORDER;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey (SURVEY_TYPE_ID, SURVEY_QUESTION_ID, SURVEY_ID, USER_ID, SURVEY_OPT_ID) VALUES values (#{SURVEY_TYPE_ID}, #{SURVEY_QUESTION_ID}, #{SURVEY_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{SURVEY_OPT_ID});
